languages.text: {n}По-птичьи склонив голову к плечу, Кунрад глумливо смеется:{/n} "Я иду к величию, {name}. Настоящей мощи, о которой вы с Теодорой могли лишь мечтать. Предел рассвета пообещал сплести для меня поистине великую судьбу!"

{n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, of the kind you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"
languages.original_text: {n}По-птичьи склонив голову к плечу, Кунрад глумливо смеется:{/n} "Я иду к величию, {name}. Настоящей мощи, о которой вы с Теодорой могли лишь мечтать. Предел рассвета пообещал сплести для меня поистине великую судьбу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply, like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, the kind of which you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

{n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply, like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, the kind of which you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

{n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply, like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, the kind of which you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

{n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply, like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, the kind of which you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

{n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, of the kind you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

{n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, of the kind you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

languages.text: {n}维特威尔像鸟一样猛地仰起了头，发出嘲讽的大笑声。{/n}“我正走在伟大的道路上，{name}。那是真正的力量，是你和西奥多拉这种人想都不敢想的力量！破晓锋刃承诺会为我编织非凡的命运！”
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, of the kind you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

traits.locale_text: {n}维特威尔像鸟一样猛地仰起了头，发出嘲讽的大笑声。{/n}“我正走在伟大的道路上，{name}。那是真正的力量，是你和西奥多拉这种人想都不敢想的力量！破晓锋刃承诺会为我编织非凡的命运！”

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir penche brusquement la tête, comme un oiseau, et éclate d'un rire moqueur.{/n} « Je m'apprête à accéder à la grandeur, {name}. Au pouvoir véritable, dont Théodora et vous pourriez à peine rêver. La Lame de l'Aube a promis de me tisser un destin exceptionnel ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, of the kind you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir penche brusquement la tête, comme un oiseau, et éclate d'un rire moqueur.{/n} « Je m'apprête à accéder à la grandeur, {name}. Au pouvoir véritable, dont Théodora et vous pourriez à peine rêver. La Lame de l'Aube a promis de me tisser un destin exceptionnel ! »

languages.text: {n}ボイドヴィルは鳥のように鋭く首をかしげ、嘲るように笑う。{/n}「俺は偉大なる道を歩みはじめているのだ、{name}。お前やシオドーラが夢にまで見たような真の力を手に入れる。夜明けの淵は、俺に素晴らしい運命を与えてくれると約束してくれた！」
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, of the kind you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ボイドヴィルは鳥のように鋭く首をかしげ、嘲るように笑う。{/n}「俺は偉大なる道を歩みはじめているのだ、{name}。お前やシオドーラが夢にまで見たような真の力を手に入れる。夜明けの淵は、俺に素晴らしい運命を与えてくれると約束してくれた！」

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir ladea la cabeza como un pájaro y se ríe, burlón.{/n} «Sigo el camino a la grandeza, {name}. Al verdadero poder, con el que Theodora y tú no podríais ni soñar. ¡El Filo del Amanecer ha prometido tejerme un destino verdaderamente notable!».
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, of the kind you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir ladea la cabeza como un pájaro y se ríe, burlón.{/n} «Sigo el camino a la grandeza, {name}. Al verdadero poder, con el que Theodora y tú no podríais ni soñar. ¡El Filo del Amanecer ha prometido tejerme un destino verdaderamente notable!».

languages.text: {n}Voigtvir legt den Kopf scharf zur Seite, wie ein Vogel, und lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Ich bin auf dem Pfad zu wahrer Erhabenheit, {name}. Zu wahrer Macht. Macht, von der Ihr und Theodora nur träumen konnten. Der Rand des Tagesanbruchs hat versprochen, mir ein wahrlich erstaunliches Schicksal zu weben!"
languages.original_text: {n}Voigtvir cocks his head sharply like a bird, and laughs mockingly.{/n} "I am on a path to greatness, {name}. True power, of the kind you and Theodora could only dream of. The Edge of Daybreak promised to weave me a truly remarkable fate!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Voigtvir legt den Kopf scharf zur Seite, wie ein Vogel, und lacht spöttisch.{/n} "Ich bin auf dem Pfad zu wahrer Erhabenheit, {name}. Zu wahrer Macht. Macht, von der Ihr und Theodora nur träumen konnten. Der Rand des Tagesanbruchs hat versprochen, mir ein wahrlich erstaunliches Schicksal zu weben!"
